trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Friendswood
There were no other sightings in Friendswood on or around December 19th 2012
Summary: 4 bright lights not moving then started to move in a group over tree line
divs: Sighting DetailsI DID NOT KNOW WHAT TO THINK, COMING HOME IN DECEMBER IT WAS JUST DARK. I WAS GOING SOUTH ON I-45 TURNED ON EL DORADO GOING WEST. I LIVE AT THE INTERSECTION OF BLACK HAWK AND BARCELONA DR. ALMOST A DIRECTLY WEST 2.5 MILES. JUST LIKE THE WEBSTER REPORT ALMOST EXACTLY, I DID NOT SEE THE OBJECT MOVE OVER ME. I KICK MYSELF I DID NOT STOP. I DID SLOW DOWN RIGHT BEFORE THE SCHOOL ON THE RIGHT ON EL D0RADO DR. I SLOWED TO ALMOST A STOP,BUT KEPT MOVING WITH THE WINDOW DOWN. I DID NOT HEAR ANY SOUND. I TOO WAS WONDERING IS THIS A NEW LIGHT TOWER? OR WHAT CLOUD IT BE. IT MOVED SLOW TO ALMOST A HOOVER THEN SEEM TO KEEP MOVING NORTH EAST WARD. I WAS NOT THE ONLY ONE SLOWING DOWN I SAW TWO OTHERS JUST SLOWING AS I WAS. I DID NOT SEE AN OBJECT JUST A GROUPING OF LIGHTS THAT SEEM TO BE CONNECTED SOME WAY AS PART OF AN OBJECT. IF YOU LOOK AT GOOGLE MAPS FROM WHERE THE OBJECT OR LIGHTS IN A GROUP MOVING WAS AND MOVING TO IS A LINE TOWARD ELLINGTON FIELD (AIR FORCE BASE). I AM GLAD I SAW THIS ARTICLE ABOUT WEBSTER, BECAUSE EVERYDAY SINCE I HAVE KEPT THINKING WHAT DID I SEE OR I WISH I WOULD HAVE STOPPED TO OBSERVE LONGER. ALMOST THE SAME AS THE WEBSTER TEXAS IN SAME AREA DIFFERENT DATE
